successes.title: Your shoes just got insanely easy! Zubits make them magnetic
successes.description: Lace Zubits onto your own shoelaces & they become fast & easy to put on & take off. No tying, knots, or messy bows. Just a clean look.

Pledges.description: Pledge $10 and we will send you a thank you card. This is a test reward.
"Early Bird Special" 1 pair of Zubits for 1 pair of shoes.  Free USA shipping.  You can make color & size choices later.
"Midday Bird Special" 1 pair of Zubits for 1 pair of shoes.  Free USA shipping.  You can make color & size choices later.
1 pair of Zubits for 1 pair of shoes.  Free USA shipping. You can make color & size choices later.

10 pairs of Zubits for 10 pairs of shoes. Free USA shipping. You can make color & size choices later.
10 pairs of Zubits for 10 pairs of shoes. Free shipping. You can make color & size choices later. +PLUS+ a pair of original prototype Zubits and a personal phone call of thanks.
